title: Applying Machine Learning in Predicting Medication Treatment Outcomes for Opioid Use Disorder
text: This site provides supplementary materials for the manuscript by Raymond R. Balise, Kyle Grealis, Guertson Jean-Baptiste, and the CTN-0094 Team. Use the Supplementary Materials menu above or the links below.

title: Applying Machine Learning in Predicting Medication Treatment Outcomes for Opioid Use Disorder
text:
Web Supplement
A companion guide to the manuscript that explains the machine learning methods, walks through the complete analysis workflow, and provides annotated R code. Designed to be accessible whether you’re new to ML or an experienced practitioner.
View Web Supplement

title: Applying Machine Learning in Predicting Medication Treatment Outcomes for Opioid Use Disorder
text:
Technical Reference
Detailed documentation of the study’s inclusion criteria, variables/features used in the models, training/testing split methodology, and model specifications.
View Technical Reference | Download PDF

title: Applying Machine Learning in Predicting Medication Treatment Outcomes for Opioid Use Disorder
text:
Modeling Workflow
The complete modeling workflow and code will be available here once the manuscript is accepted for publication.
